amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, removes the emergency designation requirement for intelligence funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to remove the emergency designation contingency for funds appropriated for the Defense-Wide Procurement account.

action.text: Obey amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. Modification provides that $99,500,000 of the funds for Defense-Wide Procurement be subject to the emergency requirement pursuant to the Budget Act.
On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
